name: Half Dice Half Nice
description:
"Half Nice Half Dice" is a game where you have to choose what you will do, you have 5 good dices and 5 bad dices, you can roll them to get a more karma score or less. You will use them to navigate through 10 situations and your goal is to have over 10 karma at the end.

Or you could just be mean and have a laugh, its up to you!
